name: Put Your Stamp On
description:
Welcome back Mr. Director! Many things remained undone in your absence. It needs to be solved immediately.

The game is about logic that consists in putting stamps on the company's documents. The idea is that the stamp is shaped like a cube and it takes thinking to get to the side with the ink. But it's not really that simple...

Your mission is to make as many stamps as possible, using as few steps as possible so as not to run out of energy. Therefore, every move must be thought out so as not to do it in vain. Will you be able to?

Game Features :
- 30 levels
- The number of stamps is increasing
- Statistics showing the number of steps
